name: CSS for Scalabilty : Open source project
tagline: Open source project structuring Sass for scalability by using and extending ITCSS.
body: Open source project structuring Sass for scalability by using and extending ITCSS. Making CSS scalable and maintainable is a major concern for every front-end developer and large IT companies. I am currently combining SASS and extending ITCSS to create a scalable and maintainable SASS CSS starter template that will allow for easy management of CSS at scale.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
